name: Torch Liquidation Bot
description: Read-only lending market scanner for Torch Market on Solana. No wallet required. Scans migrated tokens and displays lending parameters -- interest rates, LTV thresholds, treasury balances, and active loan counts. All wallet-dependent code was removed in v2.0.0.

env.name: RPC_URL
env.description: Solana RPC endpoint (HTTPS). Used for read-only RPC calls only. Never logged, transmitted externally, or stored.

actions.name: SCAN_LENDING_MARKETS
actions.description: Discover migrated tokens and display lending parameters (rates, LTV, treasury balance, active loans)

actions.name: GET_TOKEN_LENDING_INFO
actions.description: Get lending configuration and state for a specific migrated token
